karathe kridawen daskam penwana ginthota maha widuhale wasana 2019 okthobar 01 wani angaharuwada	 - 6 ginthota maha widyalaye nawawani wasare igenuma labana ji.wi.rawindu wasana karathe kridawe niratha wemin wasara hayak thula ran padakkam nawayak, ridi padakkam dolahak saha lokada padakkam hatharak dina atha. 2017 samastha lanka pasal karathe shurathawaliye wayasa awuradu 12 n pahala dakshathama kridakayan ata dena atharata theri pathwu wasana 2019 galla kalapa krida ulele wayasa awuradu 16 n pahala kumithe anshaye ran padakkama da dina atha. 2019 dakunu palath pasal krida ulele 16 n pahala kumithe anshaye lokada padakkama da, shri lanka karathe do sammelanaya sanwidhanaya kala 2019 dakunu palath karathe shurathawaliye 14 – 15 wayas kandaye kilogram 45 bara panthiye ran padakkama da dina atha.

indiyawe chennayihi shri lanka niyojya mahakomasaris karyalaya idiripita udghoshanaye niratha wu thamilnadu em.di.em.ke. paksha mahalekam wayiko athulu pirisak erata polisiya wisin eeye (19) athadanguwata gena atha.
